item.title: Spotify Playlist Producer
item.description: Link The Spotify Playlist Producer For project files, see the GitHub repository. Source: AudioHype Source: AudioHype Link Overview Hello! This is my “Playlist Producer.” I developed this project over the course of several weeks in my Spring 2022 semester as a sophomore. At this point, I have newly rediscovered my love for computational thinking and problem solving, and want to apply my Python skills to a fun problem I’ve had for a while – my lack of new music.
